meaning_str.bing:
n. 旅行；旅程；〈文学〉历程；过程
v. 〈正式〉到…旅行；到…旅游
网络. 旅途；路程；行程

旅行；旅程；〈文学〉历程；过程

旅程；行程；长途行程；旅行；远足
旅行；长途旅行；进行长途旅行

1.en: Our journey to the sky is as a fiction. But real-life scientists in real-life laboratories are working to make it a reality.
1.cn: 我们到天上的旅行只是一种假设，但是在现实实验室里的现实科学家正在研究使其变为现实。

2.en: This friend was sure he'd fooled him and gotten the best of him -- so he set out first on the journey.
2.cn: 他的朋友还以为自己瞒过了他，占了很大的便宜–于是兴冲冲地上路了。

3.en: We all so look forward to having a cuppa with you and swapping stories of our souls journey! ! !
3.cn: 偶们都期待与你们举杯庆祝，交换偶们各自灵魂经历地故事！！！！在爱中并谢谢！

0.en: We either stay here on Earth or we leave and we journey through the galaxy.
0.cn: 我们要么待在地球上，要么离开，并在银河系旅行。

1.en: Why simply imagine, fantasize about things that might happen in space or on an interstellar journey?
1.cn: 简单地想象一下，为什么对事物的幻想会在太空或者星际旅行中发生？

2.en: I have started my research, and I will continue down this dark journey that I can only call, "Riley Matthews: evil person."
2.cn: 我开始了研究，并且会继续完成这场黑暗的旅行，然后我就可以被说成：莱丽·马修斯，一个邪恶的人。

3.en: Okay. I know she's a fan of The Canterbury Tales, so I found this cool map that illustrates the characters' journey through England.
3.cn: 好吧，我知道她很喜欢《坎特伯雷故事集》，所以我找到了这张很酷的地图，上面标明了书中人物在英国的旅行路线。

4.en: My arduous journey, however, was for naught. Although advertised to appear, he did not show up. It was at that moment, I vowed eternal hatred for Wil Wheaton.
4.cn: 然而我艰苦的旅行却一无所获，尽管广告说他会出现，却最终没来，就在那一刻，我发誓要永远憎恨威尔·惠顿。

6.en: Have a safe journey home, Mr. President.
6.cn: 回程一路顺风，总统先生。

7.en: The journey home is long, cold and exhausting.
7.cn: 这场旅程漫长，寒冷，让人筋疲力尽。

8.en: Sometimes, this journey is interrupted by land.
8.cn: 有时，这趟旅途会被陆地截断。

9.en: But the journey must not linger in the deliberation.
9.cn: 但你绝不能思虑太多而迟疑不决。

10.en: Consciousness isn't a journey upward, but a journey inward. Not a pyramid, but a maze.
10.cn: 意识不是一个由下至上的过程，而是由外至内的过程，不是一座金字塔，而是一个迷宫。

11.en: As the journey ends, I think about how far we've come.
11.cn: 旅程已结束，我却不禁会想起经历过的一切。

12.en: And for those of you who are just beginning that journey to the West and East, I want to invite you today on this amazing journey with me.
12.cn: 如果你刚刚开始这种旅程，去西方或者去东方，那我今天就要邀请你和我一起走。

13.en: I can think of no two people better prepared for the journey.
13.cn: 我认为他们做好了万全的准备，要展开这段旅程。

14.en: Bring me the first branch your shoulder brushes on your journey.
14.cn: 给我带回第一支划过你肩头的树枝。

15.en: So we have to work very hard in order to survive the long journey.
15.cn: 因此，我们必须更加努力，才能够在未来的漫漫征程中赢得胜利。

16.en: Good. My time has come. You must continue your journey without me.
16.cn: 很好 我的时辰到了，剩下的路我不能陪你走了。

17.en: I consider today a defining milestone in a very long and an bless journey.
17.cn: 我认为今天是一段漫长美好的旅途中的一个标志性里程碑。

18.en: Problem B, is this journey is going to take me roughly 50 days to complete.
18.cn: 问题二，完整走这一趟要花掉我大约50天。

19.en: Maybe Goldie was bored at home. The interesting journey has cheered her up.
19.cn: 可能是金金在家里太无聊了。一路上遇到有趣的事让她的心情变好了。
